name.value: Nictiz Geboortezorg - Client - Scenario 2.1 - Retrieve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of current pregnancy of Linda Hollanders

description.value: Scenario 2.2: Retrieve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of current pregnancy of Linda Hollanders
Query Patient resource for HCIM Patient
Test PHR client to retrieve Patient resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token Bearer d6ffbe31-c361-435d-a6b5-2c0b3d0cdcb1
Make sure that the test server (WildFHIR) gives a success response.
Confirm that the test server (WildFHIR) returns a Bundle.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
